welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huixquilucan, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historical sites, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Sudestada
restaurants.description: Sudestada is a bbq joint located in Cuajimalpa de Morelos.
restaurants.address: Arteaga y Salazar 68 (Esq. Veracruz), 05500 Cuajimalpa de Morelos, Distrito Federal

restaurants.name: La Esperanza Panadería
restaurants.description: La Esperanza Panadería is a bakery located in Huixquilucan.
restaurants.address: Av. Jesús del Monte, Huixquilucan, México

restaurants.name: La Casa de Toño
restaurants.description: La Casa de Toño is a mexican restaurant located in Cuajimalpa de Morelos.
restaurants.address: Av. San Jose de los Cedros 31, Col. San José de los Cedros, 05200 Cuajimalpa de Morelos, Distrito Federal

restaurants.name: Cabaña "La Montañita"
restaurants.description: Cabaña "La Montañita" is a mexican restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Cabaña Rancho Viejo
restaurants.description: Cabaña Rancho Viejo is a mexican restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original and largest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
